org.convertertopdf.convert

Class AbstractConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.convertertopdf.convert.AbstractConverter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HtmlConverter, OfficeConverter, PdfConverter, SimpleFileConverter

    public abstract class AbstractConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class that is responsible for providing operations to convert files to PDF.
    Author:
    Thiago Leite e-mail: thiagoleiteecarvalho@gmail.com

    • Method Summary

      Sets appropriate configurations for the converter.
      AbstractConverter to(java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
      Sets the OutputStream, that will be the pdf converted to desired format.
      AbstractConverter validade()
      Validates the data, as if the file passed is according to the type indicated for the conversion and if any source was passed.
